article.title: Https domain redirect with Nginx
article.author: Mario Bašić
article.excerpt: After struggling for a day to figure out what needs to be done for this to work, I decided to write it all down in case that I need it again in the future.

authors.bio: Author of the book: “A Collection of Laravel Tutorials”. Cofounder of Go Visit and Visit Murter information tourist portal. Creator of open-source projects.
authors.name: Mario Bašić
